𓏌 𓏌 𓏌 𓇯 𓀭 Nun 9 𓈖 Neptune 𓋞 ≙ Poseidon 𓊪 𓋴 𓆓 𓏲 "water god" ≈ 𓏌 𓏌 𓏏 𓏌 𓇯 𓁐 NUT <> 𒀭𒂗𒆠 ᵈEN-KI

𓄿 Adler ≈ Atlas :

The Greeks associated Shu with Atlas, the primordial Titan who held up the celestial sphere(s), as they are both depicted holding up the sky.
